title: Create a second pod which is identical with the one you just created (you can easily do it by changing the 'name' property on pod.yaml). Connect to it and verify that '/etc/foo' contains the 'passwd' file. Delete pods to cleanup. Note: If you can't see the file from the second pod, can you figure out why? What would you do to fix that?
